def_en: When two people get married or marry, they legally become husband and wife in a special ceremony. Get married is less formal and more commonly used than marry .

def_cn: (牧师或官员)为…主持婚礼
def_en: When a priest or official marries two people, he or she conducts the ceremony in which the two people legally become husband and wife.
If a parent marries their child to someone, the parent chooses who their child will marry and arranges it.
